body_html: (As a temporary workaround...) I've created a script for diagnosing common TensorFlow on Windows installation issues. Please download the script from https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c and run python tensorflow_self_check.py. It will print suggestions for how to fix your installation.
body_text: (As a temporary workaround...) I've created a script for diagnosing common TensorFlow on Windows installation issues. Please download the script from https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c and run python tensorflow_self_check.py. It will print suggestions for how to fix your installation.
body: (As a temporary workaround...) I've created a script for diagnosing common TensorFlow on Windows installation issues. Please download the script from https://gist.github.com/mrry/ee5dbcfdd045fa48a27d56664411d41c and run `python tensorflow_self_check.py`. It will print suggestions for how to fix your installation.
